queries.item: CREATE TABLE `?:label_value` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `tab_name` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT '', `label_name` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT '', `label_details` text NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:video_document` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `parent_name` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT '', `tab_name` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT '', `upload_type` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT '', `url` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;
